cs.LG, cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.DS 

The paper discusses metric learning, which is a subfield of machine learning that deals with optimizing distance and similarity functions. The paper proposes new methods for learning string and tree edit similarities, as well as a bilinear similarity learning method for feature vectors. These topics are closely related to natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV), which are subfields of computer science. Additionally, the paper discusses generalization guarantees, which is a topic in machine learning theory and falls under the category of theoretical computer science (cs.THE). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CL (Computation and Language), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
